1.text: Learning point: There are words that give different meanings.
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Learning point: There are words that give different meanings.</prosody></speak>

2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Example:- big to small, up to down</prosody></speak>

3.text: They are called opposites or antonyms.
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>They are called opposites or antonyms.</prosody></speak>

5.text: Fill in the blanks with the suitable words given below.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Fill in the blanks with the suitable words given below.</prosody></speak>

6.text: 1. Monkeys are noisy but the deer is ...............
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>1. Monkeys are noisy but the deer is</prosody></speak>

7.text: 2. Lions are......... but rabbits are timid.
7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>2. Lions are, but rabbits are timid.</prosody></speak>

8.text: 3. The giraffe has a long neck and hippopotamus has a ............ neck.
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>3. The giraffe has a long neck and hippopotamus has a, neck.</prosody></speak>

9.text: 4. Elephant is big and rat is ...........
9.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>4. Elephant is big and rat is</prosody></speak>

10.text: 5. Polar bear is ..........in colour but the Asian bear is black.
10.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>5. Polar bear is, in colour but the Asian bear is black.</prosody></speak>

11.text: 6. Tiger's tail is ............ and pig's tail is short.
11.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>6. Tiger's tail is, and pig's tail is short.</prosody></speak>

12.text: 7. Dog is a domestic animal and wolf is a ............. animal.
12.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>7. Dog is a domestic animal and wolf is a, animal.</prosody></speak>

13.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>8. Cheetahs are, and tortoises are slow.</prosody></speak>

14.text: quiet, short, small, wild, fast, white, thin, brave, long
14.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>quiet, short, small, wild, fast, white, thin, brave, long</prosody></speak>
